spell_tooltip.description: Summons a totem at your feet that will redirect all harmful spells cast within 34 yards on a nearby party or raid member to itself. Will not redirect area of effect spells. Lasts 3 sec.

Burrow beneath the ground, becoming unattackable, removing movement impairing effects, and increasing your movement speed by 50% for 5 sec.

When the effect ends, enemies within 6 yards are knocked in the air and take 524,081 Physical damage.

Your Heroism spell now has a 60 sec. cooldown, but increases Haste by 20%, and only affects you and your friendly target when cast for 10 sec.

In addition, Heroism is no longer affected by Exhaustion.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 187,644 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 187,412 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 189,705 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 122,865 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 121,866 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 124,092 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 142,648 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 9 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.

Chills the target with frost, causing 140,836 Frost damage and reducing the target's movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

Generates 3 Maelstrom.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.

Summons a totem at the target location for 30 sec. The totem pulses every 2 sec, rooting all enemies within 9 yards for 8 sec. Enemies previously rooted by the totem instead suffer 50% movement speed reduction.
Purges the enemy target, removing 2 beneficial Magic effects.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1.2 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
Summons a totem at your feet that shakes the ground around it for 13 sec, removing Fear, Charm and Sleep effects from party and raid members within 34 yards.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 30% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Transforms the enemy into a frog for 1 min. While hexed, the victim is incapacitated, and cannot attack or cast spells. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1. Only works on Humanoids and Beasts.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting.

Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 12,787 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them away from the Shaman. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 30%.
When you cast Spiritwalker's Grace, you become immune to Silence and Interrupt effects for 5 sec.
Grips the target in lightning, stunning and dealing 555,844 Nature damage over 5 sec while the target is lassoed. Can move while channeling.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by 15% for 18 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 2.8 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 285,862 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Instantly shocks the target with concussive force, causing 605,861 Nature damage.

Causes the earth within 8 yards of the target location to tremble and break, dealing 246,556 Physical damage over 6 sec and has a 5% chance to knock the enemy down. Multiple uses of Earthquake may overlap.

This spell is cast at a selected location.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 275% damage instead of the usual 200%.

Calls forth a Greater Fire Elemental to rain destruction on your enemies for 24 sec. 

While the Fire Elemental is active, Flame Shock deals damage 
33% faster, and newly applied Flame Shocks last 100% longer.
Increases the critical strike chance of Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 10%.
Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake have a 25% chance to refund all Maelstrom spent.

Casting Lightning Bolt, Lava Burst, or Chain Lightning has a chance to replace your next Frost Shock with Icefury, stacking up to 2 times.

 Icefury
Hurls frigid ice at the target, dealing 401,196 Frost damage and causing your next Frost Shock to deal 200% increased damage, damage 4 additional targets, and generate 7 additional Maelstrom.

Generates 12 Maelstrom.

Charge yourself with lightning, causing your next 2 Lightning Bolts to deal 150% more damage, and also causes your next 2 Lightning Bolts or Chain Lightnings to be instant cast and trigger an Elemental Overload on every target.
After casting Icefury, the next time you cast a damaging Nature and Fire spell, you additionally cast an Elemental Blast at your target at 60% effectiveness.

Increases your maximum Maelstrom by 50.

Increases Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake damage by 5%.
Elemental Fury increases critical strike damage by an additional 25%.
Casting Stormkeeper summons a powerful Lightning Elemental to fight by your side for 12 sec.
While Lightning Shield is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 8%.
Imbuing your weapon with Flametongue increases your Fire spell damage by 6.5% for 1 hour.
Increases the duration of your Elementals by 20%.
Increases Earth Shock and Earthquake damage by 8% and the stat bonuses granted by Elemental Blast by 25%.
Increases the damage dealt by your Elemental Overloads by 40%.
Flame Shock damage has a chance to generate 2 Maelstrom.
Your damaging spells incite the earth around you to come to your aid for 6 sec, repeatedly dealing 26,911 Nature damage to your most recently attacked target.
Reduces the cooldown of Flame Shock by 1.5 sec and Flame Shock deals damage 15% faster.
Dealing direct Fire, Frost, and Nature damage within 10 sec will increase all damage dealt by 10% for 10 sec. This can only occur once every 30 sec.

Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 18 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 715,618 Elemental damage, and granting you Lava Surge.

Generates 12 Maelstrom.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake can trigger your Mastery: Elemental Overload at 50% effectiveness.

Overloaded Earthquakes do not knock enemies down.
Your haste is increased by 20% while Ascendance is active and its duration is increased by 3 sec.

Increases the duration of Flame Shock by 6 sec and its damage by 50%.

Lava Burst consumes up to 3 sec of Flame Shock, instantly dealing that damage. Lava Burst overloads benefit at 50% effectiveness.
Flame Shock damage increases the damage of your next Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, or Earthquake by 1.5%, stacking up to 10 times.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.

Each Maelstrom spent has a 0.12% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 18 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.

Summons a totem at the target location that erupts dealing 80,326 Fire damage and applying Flame Shock to 3 enemies within 9 yards. Continues hurling liquid magma at a random nearby target every 0.9 sec for 6 sec, dealing 40,050 Fire damage to all enemies within 9 yards.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.
Primordial Wave calls an Ancestor to your side for 6 sec. Whenever you cast a healing or damaging spell, the Ancestor will cast a similar spell.
Ancestors have a 20% chance to call another Ancestor for 6 sec when they depart.
Lightning Bolt, Lava Burst, Chain Lightning, Icefury, and Frost Shock casts have a 8% chance to call an Ancestor to your side for 6 sec.
Lava Burst gains an additional charge and deals 5% increased damage.
When an Ancestor is called, they reduce the cooldown of Fire Elemental and Storm Elemental by 5 sec.
Increases your maximum Maelstrom by 25.
Using spells with a cast time increases the duration of Spiritwalker's Grace and Spiritwalker's Aegis by 1 sec, up to a maximum of 4 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Nature's Guardian by 15 sec and causes it to heal for an additional 10% of your maximum health.

Increases the damage of Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake by 15%.

Increases the healing of Healing Surge and Chain Heal by 15%.
When an Ancestor departs, they cast Elemental Blast at a nearby enemy.

Your next healing or damaging spell is instant, costs no mana, and deals 10% increased damage and healing.

If you know Nature's Swiftness, it is replaced by Ancestral Swiftness and causes Ancestral Swiftness to call an Ancestor to your side for 6 sec.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 190,177 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 191,897 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 188,759 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 122,118 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 121,511 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 124,986 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 137,572 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 9 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
Ghost Wolf removes snares and increases your movement speed by an additional 25% for the first 3 sec. May only occur once every 20 sec.

Chills the target with frost, causing 141,689 Frost damage and reducing the target's movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

Generates 3 Maelstrom.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 9 yards for 3 sec.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.
Reduces the cooldown of Capacitor Totem by 5 sec for each enemy it stuns, up to a maximum reduction of 20 sec.
Purges the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1.2 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
Summons a totem at your feet that shakes the ground around it for 13 sec, removing Fear, Charm and Sleep effects from party and raid members within 34 yards.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 30% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 11 yards 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting.

Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 13,032 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them away from the Shaman. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Summons a totem at your feet that removes all Poison effects from a nearby party or raid member within 34 yards every 1.5 sec for 9 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 2.8 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 285,862 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Harnesses the raw power of the elements, dealing 714,595 Elemental damage and increasing your Critical Strike or Haste by 7% or Mastery by 14% for 10 sec.

Causes the earth within 8 yards of your target to tremble and break, dealing 246,556 Physical damage over 6 sec and has a 5% chance to knock the enemy down. Multiple uses of Earthquake may overlap.

This spell is cast at your target.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 275% damage instead of the usual 200%.

Calls forth a Greater Storm Elemental to hurl gusts of wind at your enemies for 24 sec.

While the Storm Elemental is active, casting Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning increases your haste by 4%, stacking up to 4 times.
Increases the critical strike chance of Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 10%.
Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake have a 25% chance to refund all Maelstrom spent.
Lava Burst has an additional charge.

Casting Lightning Bolt, Lava Burst, or Chain Lightning has a chance to replace your next Frost Shock with Icefury, stacking up to 2 times.

 Icefury
Hurls frigid ice at the target, dealing 407,306 Frost damage and causing your next Frost Shock to deal 200% increased damage, damage 4 additional targets, and generate 7 additional Maelstrom.

Generates 12 Maelstrom.

Charge yourself with lightning, causing your next 2 Lightning Bolts to deal 150% more damage, and also causes your next 2 Lightning Bolts or Chain Lightnings to be instant cast and trigger an Elemental Overload on every target.
Casting Lava Burst increases the damage or healing of your next Nature, Physical, or Frost spell by 15%.
After casting Icefury, the next time you cast a damaging Nature and Fire spell, you additionally cast an Elemental Blast at your target at 60% effectiveness.
Your next Chain Lightning or Lightning Bolt has 30% reduced cast time after casting Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, or Earthquake. Can accumulate up to 2 charges.

Increases your maximum Maelstrom by 50.

Increases Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake damage by 5%.
Elemental Fury increases critical strike damage by an additional 25%.
Casting Stormkeeper summons a powerful Lightning Elemental to fight by your side for 12 sec.

While a Storm Elemental is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 10%.

While a Fire Elemental is active, your Fire damage dealt is increased by 10%.
While Lightning Shield is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 8%.
Increases the duration of your Elementals by 20%.
Increases Earth Shock and Earthquake damage by 8% and the stat bonuses granted by Elemental Blast by 25%.
Increases the damage dealt by your Elemental Overloads by 40%.
Dealing direct Fire, Frost, and Nature damage within 10 sec will increase all damage dealt by 10% for 10 sec. This can only occur once every 30 sec.

Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 18 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.
When your Storm Elemental or Fire Elemental expires, it leaves behind a lesser Elemental to continue attacking your enemies for 12 sec.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake make your target a Lightning Rod for 8 sec.
 
Lightning Rods take 10% of all damage you deal with Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake can trigger your Mastery: Elemental Overload at 50% effectiveness.

Overloaded Earthquakes do not knock enemies down.
Your haste is increased by 20% while Ascendance is active and its duration is increased by 3 sec.
Increases the duration of Lightning Rod by 4 sec and its damage bonus by 25%.

After casting Earth Shock, your next Earthquake deals 120% additional damage.

After casting Elemental Blast, your next Earthquake deals 140% additional damage.

Each Maelstrom spent has a 0.12% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 18 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.
Your Earth, Fire, and Storm Elementals are drawn from primal elementals 80% more powerful than regular elementals, with additional abilities, and you gain direct control over them.

Spending Maelstrom grants you 1% haste for 15 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature damage spells by 5% and the critical strike damage of your Nature spells by 5%.
Tempest increases your movement speed by 20% for 5 sec.
Lightning Bolt, Tempest, and Chain Lightning have a 50% chance to cause an additional Elemental Overload.

Tempest causes your next 2 Chain Lightning or Lightning Bolt spells to be instant cast and deal 40% increased damage.

Can accumulate up to 2 charges.
Gain one stack of Stormkeeper every 50 sec.
Earthquake and Chain Lightning damage increased by 5%.
Lightning Rod targets now also take 10% of the damage that Tempest deals, and Tempest also applies Lightning Rod effect.
Lightning Shield reduces the damage you take by 3%.
Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning have a chance to strike your target for 168,650 Nature damage. Every 3 times this occurs, your next Lightning Bolt is replaced by Tempest.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 188,178 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 188,378 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Generates 3 Maelstrom.

When you have 3 or more totems active, your movement speed is increased by 15%.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake enhance your next spell cast within 15 sec:

Flame Shock: The next cast also applies Flame Shock to 1 additional target within 8 yards of the target.

Lightning Bolt: Your next cast will cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.

Chain Lightning: Your next cast will chain to 1 additional target.

Lava Burst: Reduces the cooldown of your Fire and Storm Elemental by 4.0 sec.

Frost Shock: Freezes the target in place for 6 sec.
Lava Burst has an additional charge.

Casting Lightning Bolt, Lava Burst, or Chain Lightning has a chance to replace your next Frost Shock with Icefury, stacking up to 2 times.

 Icefury

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 121,874 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 123,976 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 138,660 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 9 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.

Chills the target with frost, causing 139,659 Frost damage and reducing the target's movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

Generates 3 Maelstrom.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.

Summons a totem at the target location for 30 sec. The totem pulses every 2 sec, rooting all enemies within 9 yards for 8 sec. Enemies previously rooted by the totem instead suffer 50% movement speed reduction.
Purges the enemy target, removing 2 beneficial Magic effects.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1.2 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
Summons a totem at your feet that shakes the ground around it for 13 sec, removing Fear, Charm and Sleep effects from party and raid members within 34 yards.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 30% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Transforms the enemy into a frog for 1 min. While hexed, the victim is incapacitated, and cannot attack or cast spells. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1. Only works on Humanoids and Beasts.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting.

Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 12,776 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them away from the Shaman. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 30%.
When you cast Spiritwalker's Grace, you become immune to Silence and Interrupt effects for 5 sec.
Grips the target in lightning, stunning and dealing 555,844 Nature damage over 5 sec while the target is lassoed. Can move while channeling.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by 15% for 18 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 2.8 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 285,862 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Instantly shocks the target with concussive force, causing 606,333 Nature damage.

Causes the earth within 8 yards of the target location to tremble and break, dealing 246,556 Physical damage over 6 sec and has a 5% chance to knock the enemy down. Multiple uses of Earthquake may overlap.

This spell is cast at a selected location.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 275% damage instead of the usual 200%.

Calls forth a Greater Fire Elemental to rain destruction on your enemies for 24 sec. 

While the Fire Elemental is active, Flame Shock deals damage 
33% faster, and newly applied Flame Shocks last 100% longer.
Increases the critical strike chance of Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 10%.
Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake have a 25% chance to refund all Maelstrom spent.

Casting Lightning Bolt, Lava Burst, or Chain Lightning has a chance to replace your next Frost Shock with Icefury, stacking up to 2 times.

 Icefury
Hurls frigid ice at the target, dealing 405,748 Frost damage and causing your next Frost Shock to deal 200% increased damage, damage 4 additional targets, and generate 7 additional Maelstrom.

Generates 12 Maelstrom.

Charge yourself with lightning, causing your next 2 Lightning Bolts to deal 150% more damage, and also causes your next 2 Lightning Bolts or Chain Lightnings to be instant cast and trigger an Elemental Overload on every target.
After casting Icefury, the next time you cast a damaging Nature and Fire spell, you additionally cast an Elemental Blast at your target at 60% effectiveness.

Increases your maximum Maelstrom by 50.

Increases Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake damage by 5%.
Elemental Fury increases critical strike damage by an additional 25%.
Casting Stormkeeper summons a powerful Lightning Elemental to fight by your side for 12 sec.
While Lightning Shield is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 8%.
Imbuing your weapon with Flametongue increases your Fire spell damage by 6.5% for 1 hour.
Increases the duration of your Elementals by 20%.
Increases Earth Shock and Earthquake damage by 8% and the stat bonuses granted by Elemental Blast by 25%.
Increases the damage dealt by your Elemental Overloads by 40%.
Flame Shock damage has a chance to generate 2 Maelstrom.
Your damaging spells incite the earth around you to come to your aid for 6 sec, repeatedly dealing 26,409 Nature damage to your most recently attacked target.
Reduces the cooldown of Flame Shock by 1.5 sec and Flame Shock deals damage 15% faster.
Dealing direct Fire, Frost, and Nature damage within 10 sec will increase all damage dealt by 10% for 10 sec. This can only occur once every 30 sec.

Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 18 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 718,656 Elemental damage, and granting you Lava Surge.

Generates 12 Maelstrom.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake can trigger your Mastery: Elemental Overload at 50% effectiveness.

Overloaded Earthquakes do not knock enemies down.
Your haste is increased by 20% while Ascendance is active and its duration is increased by 3 sec.

Increases the duration of Flame Shock by 6 sec and its damage by 50%.

Lava Burst consumes up to 3 sec of Flame Shock, instantly dealing that damage. Lava Burst overloads benefit at 50% effectiveness.
Flame Shock damage increases the damage of your next Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, or Earthquake by 1.5%, stacking up to 10 times.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.

Each Maelstrom spent has a 0.12% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 18 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.

Summons a totem at the target location that erupts dealing 81,070 Fire damage and applying Flame Shock to 3 enemies within 9 yards. Continues hurling liquid magma at a random nearby target every 0.9 sec for 6 sec, dealing 40,845 Fire damage to all enemies within 9 yards.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.
Ancestors have a 20% chance to call another Ancestor for 6 sec when they depart.
Lightning Bolt, Lava Burst, Chain Lightning, Icefury, and Frost Shock casts have a 8% chance to call an Ancestor to your side for 6 sec.
Lava Burst gains an additional charge and deals 5% increased damage.
When an Ancestor is called, they reduce the cooldown of Fire Elemental and Storm Elemental by 5 sec.
Increases your maximum Maelstrom by 25.
Using spells with a cast time increases the duration of Spiritwalker's Grace and Spiritwalker's Aegis by 1 sec, up to a maximum of 4 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Nature's Guardian by 15 sec and causes it to heal for an additional 10% of your maximum health.

Increases the damage of Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake by 15%.

Increases the healing of Healing Surge and Chain Heal by 15%.
When an Ancestor departs, they cast Elemental Blast at a nearby enemy.

Your next healing or damaging spell is instant, costs no mana, and deals 10% increased damage and healing.

If you know Nature's Swiftness, it is replaced by Ancestral Swiftness and causes Ancestral Swiftness to call an Ancestor to your side for 6 sec.
